messages.content: Stop Brexit. Build a Brighter Future

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and incentivize low carbon homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and learning throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can be trusted to stop Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and learning throughout their lives.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and incentivize low carbon homes by 2025.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

leaflet.personalStatement: Alistair Fernie is clear on the devastating impact that Brexit will have on the residents of Oxford East.

quotes.text: "If there is political will, a solution will be found"

examples: Jeremy Corbyn backs Brexit. Corbyn is letting down Labour Remainers by staying neutral on Brexit.
